description: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Samman Nidhi (PM-KISAN), launched in 2018, provides direct income support of Rs. 6000 per year to small and marginal farmers.
key_features: Direct Benefit Transfer to farmers’ bank accounts
Covers small and marginal farmers with up to 2 hectares

criteria: Small and marginal farmers with up to 2 hectares
Excludes institutional landholders and high-income farmers

steps: Register on PM-KISAN portal or at local agriculture office

special_notes: Alternate documents allowed in states like Assam and Meghalaya
